EmailTemplate.subject: Survey Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We recently sent you an invitation to participate in a parent survey. Many parents have already contributed and we would like to thank you all.
This email is to let you know the final date for participation is 22nd June.
To access the survey please visit http://app.fluidsurveys.com/s/british-schools-group/langeng/.
Kind regards,
The British School of Guangzhou.
www.bsg.org.cn
